name: secret paths
notes:
this shawl can be made of any type of yarn and suitable hook. the pattern instructs how to exclude or add rows to make it the size you like. 

if you like to make your secret paths with the scheepjes whirl yarn you can find more information about that here:

https://mijocrochet.se/2017/11/26/secret-paths-tasty-nom-nom/


this pattern is available in english (us-terms),swedish, dutch, german, french, finnish, danish, portuguese, russian, slovak and spanish.
